name: Sawk
description: The Karate Pokémon. Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.description: When taking damage equal to half or more of your current HP, roll a d4. On a result of 3 of 4, halve the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Inner Focus
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to flinching.

abilities.name: Mold Breaker
abilities.description: This Pokémon's moves ignore any abilities that would lessen their effect or ability to hit an opponent (Due to things like Water Absorb, Snow Cloak, Thick Fat, Sturdy, etc.)
